EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Content Syndication_Data Warehouse Age of Digital Transformation_Q417.Downlo
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation white paper. We hope you found it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of interest:
- eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- Case Study: Aridhia - Creating a Platform to Power the Next Generation of Clinical and Translational Informatics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/aridhia]]>
- Case Study: Supporting Rapid Launch of Game-Changing Marketing Intelligence Service for Retailers w/ Hadoop <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/wgsn-group]]>
- Case Study: O’Reilly Media - Enabling Rapid Analysis of Huge Quantities of Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/oreilly]]>
- Community Video: Learn about the Greenplum Database <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sn971CLnTxI]]>
- Community Video: Machine Learning and Cyber Security with Greenplum and Apache MADlib <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V8JjkrlgY5c]]>
- Podcast: Pivotal DOS, Managed Services for Greenplum and HDB, Lets Enterprises Focus on Analytics <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-insights/features/10-pivotal-dos-managed-services-for-greenplum-and-hdb-lets-enterprises-focus-on-analytics]]>
- Learn more: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]>
- Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
